Text:
The cameramen were absolutely HORRIBLE in that game.  I was watching this game in 1080i on my 32in LCD and all the sudden right in the middle of a play the screen blacks out.  I quickly change the channel then change it back and the signal is being broadcast in what looked to be 480p.

I was enraged!
Thanks for the upload.  Hoping to start downloading soon then can seed for awhile.
I can't get it to finish the last packet.  I keep getting a Hash Check Failed Error on Packet 830
